name: The Games' Dungeon
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

How To Play

The goal of the game is to survive for as long as possible. You carry multiple dice that can be used to activate abilities or discarded without activating their ability. The dice also act like your HP and make you move slower and make it harder to see. Enemies will deal from 1 to 3 dice of damage per hit. 

You gain dice passively and by eliminating enemies. Enemies with black outlines can be eliminated using any dice while coloured enemies can only be eliminated with their respective color of dice.  You lose when you run out of dice.

Each dice corresponds to a certain ability:

  • One does not have an ability
  • Two is used to fire one bullet in the direction you are facing
  • Three is used to fire three bullets, one in the direction you are facing and two 45 degrees away from the first one.
  • Four is used to generate a shield around the player that can withstand one hit.
  • Five is used to eliminate all enemies in very close proximity to the player (radius of 1.5 in-game units) 
  • Six is used to place a mine that explodes after 3 seconds and eliminates all enemies within 3 in-game units of the mine.

The higher your score the harder the game gets,
